email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

I hope this message finds you well. I am reaching out from Maritime Trade Services to offer a shipment of coal from Richards Bay to Rotterdam.

We have the vessel SEA HORIZON available for this route, with a cargo size of 75,000MT. The freight quote is USD 25.50 per MT under CIF terms.

Please let me know if you have any questions or need further details.

Best regards,
Laura Smith
Maritime Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for the offer. The rate seems a bit high. Could you provide more details on the vessel's DWT and LOA? Also, what is the laycan for this shipment?

Best regards,
John Doe

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

The SEA HORIZON has a DWT of 180,000 and LOA of 290m. The laycan is flexible, but we are targeting a loading window starting around 2023-10-15.

Regarding the rate, we believe it is competitive given the current market conditions. However, we are open to discussions.

Best regards,
Laura Smith

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Laura,

Thank you for the additional details. We are considering combining cargo from a nearby port to optimize the vessel’s round trip. Could you provide a quote for a multi-port option?

Also, what is the demurrage rate per day?

Best regards,
John Doe

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

For a multi-port option, we would need to look at the specifics, but we can certainly discuss it. The demurrage rate is USD 20,000 per day.

Let me know if you have more details on the additional port and cargo size.

Best regards,
Laura Smith

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Laura,

We are looking at an additional 10,000MT from a port nearby Richards Bay. Could you revise the freight quote considering this additional cargo?

Best regards,
John Doe

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

Considering the additional cargo, we can offer a revised freight quote of USD 24.00 per MT. This rate takes into account the economies of scale with the increased cargo size.

Best regards,
Laura Smith

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Laura,

The revised rate looks good. We are ready to proceed with the shipment. Please confirm the laycan and stem details.

Best regards,
John Doe

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

Great to hear that! We will confirm the laycan as 2023-10-15 to 2023-10-20. We will also ensure that the stem is ready by then.

Looking forward to a successful shipment.

Best regards,
Laura Smith

email_chain.subject: Fwd: Freight Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Laura,

Thank you for the confirmation. We are all set on our end.

Looking forward to a smooth operation.

Best regards,
John Doe
